p:
All the satellite data were processed using all the processors available and compared with the corresponding in situ data. A set of statistical tests was used to assess the performance of the atmospheric correction at each wavelength, and a
Ï‡ 2
test was also used to evaluate the spectral quality of the retrieved
R
r s
signal. The results were translated into objective scores, and the analysis was repeated using bootstrapping methods, as described above [ 34].
